metadata.title: Ensure Latest SQL Server Service Packs and Hotfixes are Installed
metadata.description: Ensure Latest SQL Server Service Packs and Hotfixes are Installed

metadata.title: Ensure 'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'CLR Enabled' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'CLR Enabled' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Cross DB Ownership Chaining' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Cross DB Ownership Chaining' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Database Mail XPs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Database Mail XPs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Ole Automation Procedures' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Ole Automation Procedures' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Remote Access' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Remote Access' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Remote Access' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Remote Access' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Remote Admin Connections' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Remote Admin Connections' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Scan For Startup Procs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'SQL Mail XPs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'SQL Mail XPs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'SQL Mail XPs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'SQL Mail XPs' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Trustworthy' Database Property is set to 'Off'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Trustworthy' Database Property is set to 'Off'

metadata.title: Ensure Unnecessary SQL Server Protocols are set to 'Disabled'
metadata.description: Ensure Unnecessary SQL Server Protocols are set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Hide Instance' option is set to 'Yes' for Production SQL Server instances
metadata.description: Ensure 'Hide Instance' option is set to 'Yes' for Production SQL Server instances

metadata.title: Ensure 'sa' Login Account is set to 'Disabled'
metadata.description: Ensure 'sa' Login Account is set to 'Disabled'

metadata.title: Ensure 'sa' Login Account has been renamed
metadata.description: Ensure 'sa' Login Account has been renamed

metadata.title: Ensure 'xp_cmdshell' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'
metadata.description: Ensure 'xp_cmdshell' Server Configuration Option is set to '0'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Server Authentication' Property is set to 'Windows Authentication Mode'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Server Authentication' Property is set to 'Windows Authentication Mode'

metadata.title: Ensure CONNECT permissions on the 'guest user' is Revoked within all SQL Server databases excluding the master, msdb and tempdb
metadata.description: Ensure CONNECT permissions on the 'guest user' is Revoked within all SQL Server databases excluding the master, msdb and tempdb

metadata.title: Ensure 'Orphaned Users' are Dropped From SQL Server Databases
metadata.description: Ensure 'Orphaned Users' are Dropped From SQL Server Databases

metadata.title: Ensure only the default permissions specified by Microsoft are granted to the public server role
metadata.description: Ensure only the default permissions specified by Microsoft are granted to the public server role

metadata.title: Ensure Windows BUILTIN groups are not SQL Logins
metadata.description: Ensure Windows BUILTIN groups are not SQL Logins

metadata.title: Ensure Windows local groups are not SQL Logins
metadata.description: Ensure Windows local groups are not SQL Logins

metadata.title: Ensure the public role in the msdb database is not granted access to SQL Agent proxies
metadata.description: Ensure the public role in the msdb database is not granted access to SQL Agent proxies

metadata.title: Ensure 'CHECK_EXPIRATION' Option is set to 'ON' for All SQL Authenticated Logins Within the Sysadmin Role
metadata.description: Ensure 'CHECK_EXPIRATION' Option is set to 'ON' for All SQL Authenticated Logins Within the Sysadmin Role

metadata.title: Ensure 'CHECK_POLICY' Option is set to 'ON' for All SQL Authenticated Logins
metadata.description: Ensure 'CHECK_POLICY' Option is set to 'ON' for All SQL Authenticated Logins

metadata.title: Ensure 'Maximum number of error log files' is set to greater than or equal to '12'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Maximum number of error log files' is set to greater than or equal to '12'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Default Trace Enabled' Server Configuration Option is set to '1'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Default Trace Enabled' Server Configuration Option is set to '1'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Default Trace Enabled' Server Configuration Option is set to '1'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Default Trace Enabled' Server Configuration Option is set to '1'

metadata.title: Ensure 'Login Auditing' is set to Both 'failed' and 'successful logins'
metadata.description: Ensure 'Login Auditing' is set to Both 'failed' and 'successful logins'

metadata.title: Ensure 'CLR Assembly Permission Set' is set to 'SAFE_ACCESS' for All CLR Assemblies
metadata.description: Ensure 'CLR Assembly Permission Set' is set to 'SAFE_ACCESS' for All CLR Assemblies

sql57_test.comment: Ensure Trustworthy Database Property is set to Off
Ensure TcpPort is not equal to 1433
Ensure no extra permissions granted to public
Ensure no Builtin groups are logins
Ensure Windows local groups are not SQL Logins
Ensure the public role in the msdb database is not granted access to SQL Agent proxies
Ensure Check_Expiration is ON for High Privilege Logins
Ensure Check_Policy is ON for all SQL Authenticated Logins
Ensure number of error logs is greater than or equal to 12

sql57_object.sql: SELECT SERVERPROPERTY('ProductVersion') as result
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Ad Hoc Distributed Queries';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'clr enabled';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'cross db ownership chaining';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Database Mail XPs';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'Ole Automation Procedures';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'remote access';
SELECT CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'remote access';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured, CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'remote admin connections' AND SERVERPROPERTY('IsClustered') = 0;
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'scan for startup procs';
SELECT CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'scan for startup procs';
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'SQL Mail XPs';
SELECT CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'SQL Mail XPs';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Trustworthy Database Property is set to Off
sql57_object.sql: SELECT name FROM sys.databases WHERE is_trustworthy_on = 1 AND name != 'msdb';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure TcpPort is not equal to 1433
sql57_object.sql: BEGIN EXEC master.sys.xp_instance_regread N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', N'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQLServer\SuperSocketNetLib\Tcp\IPAll', N'TcpPort'; END
BEGIN EXEC master.sys.xp_instance_regread @rootkey = N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', @key = N'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Microsoft SQL Server\MSSQLServer\SuperSocketNetLib', @value_name = N'HideInstance'; END
SELECT name, is_disabled FROM sys.server_principals WHERE sid = 0x01;
SELECT name FROM sys.server_principals WHERE sid = 0x01;
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'xp_cmdshell';
SELECT SERVERPROPERTY('IsIntegratedSecurityOnly') as login_mode";"
SELECT name, hasdbaccess FROM sys.sysusers WHERE name = 'guest'
EXEC sp_change_users_login @Action='Report';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure no extra permissions granted to public
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM master.sys.server_permissions WHERE (grantee_principal_id = SUSER_SID(N'public') and state_desc LIKE 'GRANT%') AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'VIEW ANY DATABASE' and class_desc = 'SERVER') AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'CONNECT' and class_desc = 'ENDPOINT' and major_id = 2) AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'CONNECT' and class_desc = 'ENDPOINT' and major_id = 3) AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'CONNECT' and class_desc = 'ENDPOINT' and major_id = 4) AND NOT (state_desc = 'GRANT' and [permission_name] = 'CONNECT' and class_desc = 'ENDPOINT' and major_id = 5);

sql57_object.comment: Ensure no Builtin groups are logins
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_principals pr JOIN sys.server_permissions pe ON pr.principal_id = pe.grantee_principal_id WHERE pr.name like 'BUILTIN%';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Windows local groups are not SQL Logins
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM sys.server_principals pr JOIN sys.server_permissions pe ON pr.[principal_id] = pe.[grantee_principal_id] WHERE pr.[type_desc] = 'WINDOWS_GROUP' AND pr.[name] like CAST(SERVERPROPERTY('MachineName') AS nvarchar) + '%';

sql57_object.comment: Ensure the public role in the msdb database is not granted access to SQL Agent proxies
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM dbo.sysproxylogin spl JOIN sys.database_principals dp ON dp.sid = spl.sid JOIN sysproxies sp ON sp.proxy_id = spl.proxy_id WHERE principal_id = USER_ID('public');

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Check_Expiration is ON for High Privilege Logins
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM sys.sql_logins AS l WHERE IS_SRVROLEMEMBER('sysadmin',name) = 1 AND l.is_expiration_checked <> 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM sys.sql_logins AS l JOIN sys.server_permissions AS p ON l.principal_id = p.grantee_principal_id WHERE p.type = 'CL' AND p.state IN ('G', 'W') AND l.is_expiration_checked <> 1;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure Check_Policy is ON for all SQL Authenticated Logins
sql57_object.sql: SELECT 1 FROM sys.sql_logins WHERE is_policy_checked = 0;

sql57_object.comment: Ensure number of error logs is greater than or equal to 12
sql57_object.sql: BEGIN EXEC master.sys.xp_instance_regread N'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', N'Software\Microsoft\MSSQLServer\MSSQLServer', N'NumErrorLogs'; END
SELECT CAST(value as int) as value_configured FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'default trace enabled';
SELECT CAST(value_in_use as int) as value_in_use FROM sys.configurations WHERE name = 'default trace enabled';
BEGIN exec xp_loginconfig 'audit level'; END
SELECT name, permission_set_desc FROM sys.assemblies where is_user_defined = 1;

sql57_state.comment: Ensure TcpPort is not equal to 1433
Ensure number of error logs is greater than or equal to 12

external_variable.comment: Ensure TcpPort is not equal to 1433
Ensure number of error logs is greater than or equal to 12
